message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and potential impact, I understand its intrinsic worth to you stands at $1500000. My proposal is to offer it to you at a price of $1350000. This price reflects a strategic compromise aimed at ensuring both parties' satisfaction while maximizing my earnings. I look forward to your positive consideration of this offer.
